fields.name: path_prefix
fields.title: Base URL
fields.description: The base URL of this site. Useful for sites hosted under specific path, e.g.: https://www.example.com/my-site/

fields.name: domain
fields.title: Domain
fields.description: The domain of your site, including the protocol, e.g. https://mysite.com/

fields.name: favicon
fields.title: Favicon
fields.description: A square icon that represents your website

fields.name: palette
fields.title: Color Palette
fields.description: The color palette of the site

fields.name: stackbit_file_path
fields.title: Site Configuration File Path
fields.description: The file path of the file that stores this data

fields.name: logo_img
fields.title: Logo
fields.description: The logo image displayed in the header (if no logo added, the site title is displayed instead)

fields.name: logo_img_alt
fields.title: Logo Alt Text
fields.description: The alt text of the logo image

fields.name: has_nav
fields.title: Enable Navigation
fields.description: Display the navigation menu bar in the header

fields.name: has_nav
fields.title: Enable Horizontal Navigation
fields.description: Display the horizontal navigation menu bar in the footer

fields.name: content
fields.title: Footer Content
fields.description: The copyright text displayed in the footer

fields.name: links
fields.title: Links
fields.description: A list of links displayed in the footer

fields.name: content
fields.title: Content
fields.description: The content of the section, appears above the form

fields.name: form_id
fields.title: Form ID
fields.description: A unique identifier of the form, must not contain whitespace

fields.name: form_action
fields.title: Form Action
fields.description: The path of your custom "success" page, if you want to replace the default success message.

fields.name: hide_labels
fields.title: Hide labels of the form fields?

fields.name: image
fields.title: Image
fields.description: The image displayed in the section

fields.name: image_alt
fields.title: Image Alt Text
fields.description: The alt text of the image

fields.name: content
fields.title: Content
fields.description: The text content of the section

fields.name: stackbit_url_path
fields.title: URL Path
fields.description: The URL path of this page relative to site root. For example, the site root page would be "/", and post page would be "posts/new-post/"

fields.name: stackbit_dir
fields.title: Directory
fields.description: The directory path where this file is stored

fields.title: Name
fields.description: The name of the field, submitted with the form

fields.title: Label
fields.description: The caption of the field, shown above the field input

fields.description: The placeholder for textual field types or default option for select field

fields.title: Options
fields.description: The list of options for select field

fields.name: title
fields.title: Title
fields.description: The page title that goes into the <title> tag

fields.name: description
fields.title: Description
fields.description: The page description that goes into the <meta name="description"> tag

fields.name: robots
fields.title: Robots
fields.description: The items that go into the <meta name="robots"> tag

fields.name: extra
fields.title: Extra
fields.description: Additional definition for specific meta tags such as open-graph, twitter, etc.

fields.name: name
fields.title: Source name
fields.description: A canonical name for the source this asset is originating from

fields.name: id
fields.title: Asset Source ID
fields.description: The unique ID for the asset within the originating source so you can programatically find back to it

fields.name: url
fields.title: Asset information URL
fields.description: A URL to find more information about this asset in the originating source
